gradle/org.gradle.nativeplatform.toolchain/GccCompatibleToolChain

GccCompatibleToolChain

@Incubating
interface GccCompatibleToolChain : NativeToolChain(source)

A ToolChain that can handle additional platforms simply by configuring the NativeBinary.
